Waltham.Charles W. Noyes House: The Charles W. Noyes House is an historic single-family bungalow located at 271 Chestnut Street in the village of West Newton in Newton, Massachusetts. Designed in the American Craftsman style of architecture by Boston-based architect Hubert G. Ripley of Ripley & Le Boutillier, it was built in 1914. It is 1-1/2 stories in height, with a broad shallow-pitched clipped-gable roof and stuccoed exterior.
